profile.primary_concern: nervousness about potential side effects and stigma from peers

context: The user has been managing an anxiety disorder, which makes her feel overwhelmed when considering starting PrEP. She fears not only the medical aspects of the medication but also the reactions from friends and community members who may not understand her choice.
example_questions_clean: Je, PrEP ina madhara gani ambayo yanapaswa kujulikana?
Ninaweza kupata wapi msaada wa kiakili wakati wa kuanza kutumia PrEP?
Nifanye nini ikiwa nitaona dalili za upande wa dawa ya PrEP?
Ni vigezo gani vinavyotajwa katika kutafuta mahali pa kupata PrEP?
Je, kuna watu wengine wanaopata changamoto kama zangu katika kuanza PrEP?
